data.comment: The match is underway. Coventry have kicked-off.
The first-half has come to a close in Middlesbrough.
In the minute 46, Middlesbrough kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Marcus Browne is replacing Patrick Roberts for Middlesbrough at Riverside.
Middlesbrough make their second substitution with Hayden Coulson replacing Marcus Tavernier.
In the minute 70, The away team have replaced Ryan Giles with Fankaty Dabo. This is the first substitution made today by Mark Robins.
Mark Robins (Coventry) is making a second substitution, with Tyler Walker replacing Jordan Shipley.
Callum O`Hare is on a sub for Jamie Allen for Coventry.
In the minute 81, Goal! Britt Assombalonga gives Middlesbrough a 1-0 lead.
David Webb blows to end the match. The final score is 2-0.
At Riverside, Djed Spence has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Britt Assombalonga (Middlesbrough) gets a yellow card.
Djed Spence puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
